name: Wikipedia - Layout, enhanced
description: by grom. Slim, modern-looking Wikipedia and it's sister sites which works on Firefox, Chrome, Opera. Lets you concentrate on reading, with most tools conveniently compacted until mouse-hovered. This is a layout style. For different colors, read additional info below. Registered Wikipedia editors should add this companion style. Enjoy!
additional_info: For different color sets, also add one of these styles: → style 64023 → style 65252 → style 64085 → style 63608 Works on most Wikimedia sites, such as wikipedia.org, wikimedia.org, wiktionary.org, wikiquote.org, wikibooks.org, wikisource.org, wikinews.org, wikiversity.org and mediawiki.org. Changelog: 2015-01-04 - fixed Table of Contents on German Wikipedia. 2014-09-27 - minor fix for "written script" selection menu on Chinese and Serbian sub-wikis. 2013-11-13 - references now collapse by default (if JavaScript is enabled); to make them expand, just hold your mouse over them for about a second; other minor fixes. 2013-09-19 - fixed the new "VisualEditor", again. 2013-09-05 - fixed position of left menu. 2013-08-05 - fixed the new "VisualEditor". 2013-07-28 - fixed the new Table of Contents. 2013-07-23 - fixed links to sister-projects, thank you user 176356 for reporting. 2013-07-07 - fixed the new language selection popup. 2013-05-31 - added wikivoyage.org domain. 2013-05-14 - added URLs starting with "http://www.baka-tsuki.org/project/". 2013-05-07 - update because of changes in how Firefox (and soon Chrome) render multiple columns; added columns to languages menu on Opera as well. 2013-04-04 - fixed a Chrome specific issue with .vectorTabs menu overflowing. 2013-02-26 - fixed the crazy Wikipedia blunder they've made today with their updates; added wikidata.org domain. 2013-02-11 - fixed mobile subdomain; fixed a couple more unordered lists. 2013-01-28 - Support for registered users. 2013-01-01 - New Year present - introduced several more menus at top, including print! ;) Languages and navigation menus now represented with images. Name changed/shortened. Enjoy! (old version available here, but will not be maintained) (older items truncated) Based on style 36778 (version from 2012-03-12) by user 18227.
